awd_titl_txt: Workshop on Geospace Environment Modeling: Definition Phase of the Theory Campaign on Magnetopause and Boundary Layer   Physics
awd_abstract_narration: A workshop on the magnetopause and boundary layer physics is               planned for the definition phase of the GEM program.  This                      workshop will bring together theoreticians and experimentalists                 to review their knowledge of boundary layer physics and to                      recommend the future direction of research.  Small working                      groups will be formed to define the theory campaign and its                     interaction with observational research.  The research topics of                this workshop are important in understanding microscale processes               in the solar wind-magnetosphere-ionosphere-mesosphere coupling                  on a global scale.
org_div_long_name: Division of Atmospheric and Geospace Sciences
